itemDescription: Scottish footballer (1872-1898), played in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers

wikipedia_page.main: George Ferguson (5 January 1872–1898) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers.

response: *George Ferguson (Royal Navy officer) (1788–1867), Scottish admiral and Member of Parliament
